description: Try our easy to follow Rocky Road Hot Cross Buns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot cross buns,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Rocky road,Chocolate,Easter,Quick & easy dessert
name: Rocky Road Hot Cross Buns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 hot cross buns with cadbury chocolate, halved

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place halved hot cross buns on tray and top each with a rocky road mallow.
Bake for 5 minutes, then remove tray from oven and flatten the rocky road mallows with the back of a spoon. Sandwich halves together with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream.
